name: Hopetoad
description:
Hopetaod is a deck builder puzzle game! 

So there is a deal. You have a card in your hand and you can only place them on a particular spot near you on the field. Every card has its own attributes. You can apply an attribute to the spot. If you can move - you lose. If you have no HP - you lose. If you reach the end flag - you win.

This is basically a naked concept of the game. So I need all feedback you can provide. 

So hope you'll like this small game! Please post your opinion on it!
